title: The Trevor Ariza Trade That Wasn’t, Then Was | Heat Check (Ep. 355)
description:
A three-team trade centered on the Washington Wizards acquiring Trevor Ariza falls through in dramatic circumstance and is reincarnated in altered form (4:21): The Phoenix Suns receive Kelly Oubre Jr. and Austin Rivers while the Memphis Grizzlies keep the status quo (30:36).

Host: John Gonzalez
Guest: Joe House, Jonathan Tjarks
